title: The Charlotte Ap - 1 Bedroom (#305)
posting_body: Each unit has been updated with a new kitchen, updated appliances, and a renovated bathroom featuring either beautifully restored original clawfoot tubs or brand new walk-in showers.
Both heat and A/C are available in each unit and controlled by the resident.
Water and common area maintenance are included in the rent.
Gated secured parking is available and all pets are welcome (pet fees apply).
Coin and smartphone operated laundry is available on site.

*The rental or lease of this property must comply with the City of Detroit ordinance regulating the use of criminal background checks as part of the tenant screening process to provide citizens with criminal backgrounds a fair opportunity.
For additional information, please contact the City of Detroit Office of Civil Rights, Inclusion and Opportunity.
